name: Nightingale (GabrielHoltschlag)
description:
Nightingale is a 2D horror game made for SCREAM JAM 2019. Developed in Unity.

Story
Running away from an insane school never proved to be an easy task, especially when you’re being pursued. The forest is dark and difficult to navigate, but a strange voice aids in your journey to escape from him by telling you ominous stories of what happened in the past. Will you be able to reach the end without getting caught? That’s for you to decide

Created by:

Aaron Munavish-Hogarth

Ariana Tomcsak

Gabriel Holtschlag

Namnam Goodarzi
